parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - HTML

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets P font of given HTML control or its size.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetFontP''' fontOrSize

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> fontOrSize: [[String]] or [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetFontP]] "TahomaB";</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetFontP]] 0.05;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlSetFontHeightSecondary]] [[ctrlSetFontSecondary]]
</value></part></template>
